election_record.label: Indiana 1808 Legislative Council, Clark County, Special

sub_unit.name: Territorial Legislature
sub_unit.note: "Samual Gwathney a member of the Legislative Council has accepted and now exercises the office of Register of the land office for the district of Jeffersonville, whereby his seat has become vacated." The Western Sun (Vicennes). November 26, 1808.

"Resolved therefore that this House in pursuance of the ordinance do now proceed to nominate two persons to be returned to the President of the United States in order that he may appoint of them to fill the place of the said Samuel Gwathmey in the Legislative Council." The Western Sun (Vicennes). November 26, 1808.
"Whereupon resolved that Hugh M'Cally and Charles Beggs are the proper persons to be returned to the President to fill said vacancy." The Western Sun (Vicennes). November 26, 1808.
